text: Broekhuizen is a village in the Dutch province of Limburg. It is a part of the municipality of Horst aan de Maas. In 2021, 1,050 people lived there. It was an independent municipality until 2001. Category:Settlements in Limburg (Netherlands) Category:Former municipalities of Limburg (Netherlands) Category:Horst aan de Maas
title: Broekhuizen, Limburg
